item.title: CVE-2024-6510|2024-09-12T15:12:46.476Z -- avg -- internet%20security
item.description: Local Privilege Escalation in AVG Internet Security v24 on Windows allows a local unprivileged user to escalate privileges to SYSTEM via COM-Hijacking.
